/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, providing a touch of nature amidst the cityscape. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the details and colors of the scene.
